mapper.select: SELECT p.purchaseSlipCode ,p.amount ,p.tax ,p.count ,((p.amount + p.tax) * p.COUNT) AS amt ,c.businessName ,p.briefs FROM k1_tb_purchase_slip AS p JOIN k1_tb_client AS c ON p.clientCode = c.clientCode WHERE p.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT s.salesSlipCode ,s.amount ,s.tax ,s.count ,((s.amount + s.tax) * s.COUNT) AS amt ,c.businessName ,s.briefs FROM k1_tb_sales_slip AS s JOIN k1_tb_client AS c ON s.clientCode = c.clientCode WHERE s.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT p.purchaseSlipCode ,p.amount ,p.tax ,p.count ,p.purchaseTsCode ,((p.amount + p.tax) * p.COUNT) AS amt ,c.businessName ,p.briefs ,p.regDate ,p.updateDate ,u.userName FROM k1_tb_purchase_slip AS p JOIN k1_tb_client AS c ON p.clientCode = c.clientCode INNER JOIN k1_tb_user AS u ON p.regId = u.userId WHERE purchaseSlipCode = #{purchaseSlipCode};

SELECT s.salesSlipCode ,s.amount ,s.tax ,s.salesTsCode ,s.count ,((s.amount + s.tax) * s.COUNT) AS amt ,c.businessName ,s.briefs ,s.regDate ,s.updateDate ,u.userName FROM k1_tb_sales_slip AS s JOIN k1_tb_client AS c ON s.clientCode = c.clientCode INNER JOIN k1_tb_user AS u ON s.regId = u.userId WHERE salesSlipCode = #{salesSlipCode};
SELECT RIGHT(pt.purchaseTsCode,3) as purchaseTsCode ,pt.briefs FROM k1_tb_purchase_transaction AS pt WHERE pt.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};
SELECT RIGHT(st.salesTsCode,3) as salesTsCode ,st.briefs FROM k1_tb_sales_transaction AS st WHERE st.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT pt.purchaseTsCode ,pt.clientCode ,SUM(ptd.COUNT) as count ,SUM(ptd.unitPrice) AS amount ,SUM(ptd.vat) as vat ,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pt.briefs SEPARATOR ', ') AS briefs FROM k1_tb_purchase_transaction AS pt JOIN k1_tb_purchase_transaction_detail AS ptd ON pt.purchaseTsCode = ptd.purchaseTsCode GROUP BY pt.purchaseTsCode

SELECT CASE WHEN (MAX(RIGHT(salesSlipCode,1)) > 0) THEN CONCAT( 'S', DATE_FORMAT(#{slipDate}, '%y-%m-%d'), '-', MAX(RIGHT(salesSlipCode,1))+1 ) ELSE CONCAT( 'S',DATE_FORMAT(#{slipDate}, '%y-%m-%d'), '-', 1 ) END AS salesSlipCode FROM k1_tb_sales_slip WHERE SUBSTR(salesSlipCode,2,8) = DATE_FORMAT(#{slipDate}, '%y-%m-%d');

SELECT CASE WHEN (MAX(RIGHT(purchaseSlipCode,1)) > 0) THEN CONCAT( 'P', DATE_FORMAT(#{slipDate}, '%y-%m-%d'), '-', MAX(RIGHT(purchaseSlipCode,1))+1 ) ELSE CONCAT( 'P',DATE_FORMAT(#{slipDate}, '%y-%m-%d'), '-', 1 ) END AS purchaseSlipCode FROM k1_tb_purchase_slip WHERE SUBSTR(purchaseSlipCode,2,8) = DATE_FORMAT(#{slipDate}, '%y-%m-%d');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k1_tb_total_accounting (totalAccountCode, mainBusinessCode, purchaseSlipCode, salesSection, totalPrice, regDate) VALUES( (SELECT CONCAT('total_',LPAD(CAST(MAX(RIGHT(ac.totalAccountCode,3))+1 AS CHAR), 3, '0')) FROM k1_tb_total_accounting AS ac), 'fac_ksmartSeoul_Seoul_001', #{purchaseSlipCode}, '비용', ( (#{amount}+#{tax}) * #{count} ), NOW())

INSERT INTO k1_tb_total_accounting (totalAccountCode, mainBusinessCode, salesSlipCode, salesSection, totalPrice, regDate) VALUES( (SELECT CONCAT('total_',LPAD(CAST(MAX(RIGHT(ac.totalAccountCode,3))+1 AS CHAR), 3, '0')) FROM k1_tb_total_accounting AS ac), 'fac_ksmartSeoul_Seoul_001', #{salesSlipCode}, '매출', ( (#{amount}+#{tax}) * #{count} ), NOW())
